title: Welcome to Miami!
description: Miami is a wonderful place! Full of life and sunshine, there are so many things to do. Visit our amazing beaches, stay at luxury resorts, eat amazing food, see the famous Miami Zoo, or go see the Everglades! You can do all of these for a reasonable price with our help!

services.title: Transportation
services.intro: We provide a multitude of diferent transportation services, as well as resources for alternative transport methods we dont provide! Whether you are alone or in a group we can provide transport for parties of all sizes!

services.title: Miami Tours
services.intro: We provide guided tours of our wonderful cities! See the best places to visit on our tours. Visit historical landmarks, or do a tour through downtown!

services.title: Miami Restaurants
services.intro: Visit the best restaurants the culinary scene in Miami has to offer! From michelin star restaurants to famous local dives, from asian fusion to mexican we have it all!

services.title: Miami Shopping
services.intro: Go to our extensive shopping malls and unique stores all around the city! Buy authentic souvineers or designer clothing, it is up to you!

packages.title: Zoo Trips
packages.text: An assortment of thing to do at the zoo

packages.title: Florida Keys Trip
packages.text: A variety of experinces in the Florida keys

packages.title: Watersports
packages.text: A variety of watersports, equipment included

packages.title: City Tour
packages.text: A daylong tour of the city, where you go is your choice!

packages.title: Everglades Adventure
packages.text: Explore the wilderness of the Everglades!
